 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package metaface.interaction

Class Summary
BestList This class keeps a list of the best matching DMTL states to a user's stimulus
BestListItem BestListItem is a structure of information for elements of a BestList vector
DefaultTopic This class store the DMTL default topic element and all of the subsequent states.
DMTLDebugger This is a utility class for testing and debugging DMTL files on the command line
DMTLErrorHandler Error handler to report errors and warnings from parsing DMTL file
DMTLMemoryState DMTLMemoryState is a collection of state variables used in the DMTLMemoryParser
DMTLParser DMTLParser takes DMTL documents and transforms them into an internal storage format (KnowledgeBase).
DMTLTagReader This class contains the callback routines neccessary to read DMTL into memory (KnowledgeBase).
EntryState This class provides a different type of DMTL State to cover normal entry actions
Evaluate This class provides evaluate actions within a DMTL knowledge base
InteractionContext A utility class for keeping the current interaction context
InteractionManager This class handles all interaction within a MetaFace application.
KnowledgeBase This class is an internal representation of a DMTL document.
LinkedState This class provides a different type of DMTL State to cover linked entry actions
Macros DMTL makes use of “stimulus” elements to provide a match to user stimuli, such as a typed question.
NextState This class is based on the DMTL nextstate element and represents a state that must be searched in the following interaction
PreState This class is based on the DMTL prestate element and represents a state that must have been given as a response in order to access this state during interaction
Response This class provides a response to a user's interaction with natural language or hypertext
Signal This class provides a signal to application code once a state is given as a response
State This class provides an abstract basis for DMTL State elements.
Stimulus This state reoresents a DMTL stimulus element for matching to a user's stimulus.
SubTopic This clas represents a subtopic DMTL element and is used to organsise the structure and searching strategy.
Topic This clas represents a subtopic DMTL element and is used to organsise the structure and searching strategy.
WordChain A utility class for representing strings as individual words.
WordGraph WordGraph is responsible for building word graphs from text stimulus and matching these graphs against text stimulus.
WordGraphNode An individual word node of a WordGraph
